quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
name: Henry Ford

quote: Joy in looking and comprehending is nature's most beautiful gift.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Character is higher than intellect. A great soul will be strong to live as well as think.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: I'm not the smartest fellow in the world, but I can sure pick smart colleagues.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
name: Aristotle

quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: I know that I am intelligent, because I know that I know nothing.
name: Socrates

quote: Your intellect may be confused, but your emotions will never lie to you.
name: Roger Ebert

quote: Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.
name: Henry Ford

quote: Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: An intelligent man is sometimes forced to be drunk to spend time with his fools.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: I don't even call it violence when it's in self defense; I call it intelligence.
name: Malcolm X

quote: If everyone is thinking alike, then somebody isn't thinking.
name: George S. Patton

quote: Common sense is genius dressed in its working clothes.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: An intellectual is someone whose mind watches itself.
name: Albert Camus

quote: The brain is like a muscle. When it is in use we feel very good. Understanding is joyous.
name: Carl Sagan

quote: There are some ideas so wrong that only a very intelligent person could believe in them.
name: George Orwell

quote: Science has not yet taught us if madness is or is not the sublimity of the intelligence.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Common sense is not so common.
name: Voltaire

quote: Leadership is all about emotional intelligence. Management is taught, while leadership is experienced.
name: Rajeev Suri

quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
name: Plutarch

quote: To expect the unexpected shows a thoroughly modern intellect.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: An intellectual is a man who doesn't know how to park a bike.
name: Spiro T. Agnew

quote: You have to be smart. The easy days are over.
name: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Small minds are concerned with the extraordinary, great minds with the ordinary.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Intelligence is the wife, imagination is the mistress, memory is the servant.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Give me a smart idiot over a stupid genius any day.
name: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Genius is the ability to renew one's emotions in daily experience.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: It has yet to be proven that intelligence has any survival value.
name: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Genius is talent set on fire by courage.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Intellectual passion drives out sensuality.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: A great deal of intelligence can be invested in ignorance when the need for illusion is deep.
name: Saul Bellow

quote: The first method for estimating the intelligence of a ruler is to look at the men he has around him.
name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: The voice of the intellect is a soft one, but it does not rest until it has gained a hearing.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Often the hands will solve a mystery that the intellect has struggled with in vain.
name: Carl Jung

quote: If you have the guts to keep making mistakes, your wisdom and intelligence leap forward with huge momentum.
name: Holly Near

quote: Be what you are. This is the first step toward becoming better than you are.
name: Julius Charles Hare

quote: Action is the real measure of intelligence.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: I must have a prodigious quantity of mind; it takes me as much as a week sometimes to make it up.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Sculpture is the art of the intelligence.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Genius is more often found in a cracked pot than in a whole one.
name: E. B. White

quote: Wit is educated insolence.
name: Aristotle

quote: Ignorance is bold and knowledge reserved.
name: Thucydides

quote: I won't insult your intelligence by suggesting that you really believe what you just said.
name: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quote: It is the mark of a truly intelligent person to be moved by statistics.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I not only use all the brains that I have, but all that I can borrow.
name: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Immaturity is the incapacity to use one's intelligence without the guidance of another.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: We need a president with tremendous intelligence, smarts, cunning, strength and stamina.
name: Donald Trump

quote: The greatest scholars are not usually the wisest people.
name: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: A man of genius makes no mistakes; his errors are volitional and are the portals of discovery.
name: James Joyce

quote: Football is a game about feelings and intelligence.
name: Jose Mourinho

quote: Intelligence and courtesy not always are combined; Often in a wooden house a golden room we find.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: It's a poor sort of memory that only works backwards.
name: Lewis Carroll

quote: There is no worse screen to block out the Spirit than confidence in our own intelligence.
name: John Calvin

quote: Be smarter than other people, just don't tell them so.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Man is the most intelligent of the animals - and the most silly.
name: Diogenes

quote: You can't get closer to the heart of national sovereignty than national security and intelligence services.
name: Gijs de Vries

quote: The sad thing about artificial intelligence is that it lacks artifice and therefore intelligence.
name: Jean Baudrillard

quote: I would like to take you seriously, but to do so would affront your intelligence.
name: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quote: Intelligence is not to make no mistakes, but quickly to see how to make them good.
name: Bertolt Brecht

quote: I ultimately got into robotics because for me, it was the best way to study intelligence.
name: Sebastian Thrun

quote: The intellect of the wise is like glass; it admits the light of heaven and reflects it.
name: Augustus Hare

quote: Shall I not have intelligence with the earth? Am I not partly leaves and vegetable mould myself.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Educate the masses, elevate their standard of intelligence, and you will certainly have a successful nation.
name: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: For the execution of the voyage to the Indies, I did not make use of intelligence, mathematics or maps.
name: Christopher Columbus

quote: The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: Genius ain't anything more than elegant common sense.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: The key to artificial intelligence has always been the representation.
name: Jeff Hawkins

quote: A year spent in artificial intelligence is enough to make one believe in God.
name: Alan Perlis

quote: Like many intellectuals, he was incapable of saying a simple thing in a simple way.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: Wealth, in even the most improbable cases, manages to convey the aspect of intelligence.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Foolishness is rarely a matter of lack of intelligence or even lack of information.
name: John McCarthy

quote: Public trust is a vital condition for artificial intelligence to be used productively.
name: Mark Walport

quote: The emotional brain responds to an event more quickly than the thinking brain.
name: Daniel Goleman

name: Bertrand Russell

quote: The mob spirit has grown with the increasing intelligence of the Afro-American.
name: Ida B. Wells

quote: That which the Fascists hate above all else, is intelligence.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: Politeness decrees that you must listen to be kind; intelligence decrees that you must listen to learn.
name: Letitia Baldrige

quote: When I see a dolphin, I know it's just as smart as I am.
name: Captain Beefheart

quote: To think well and to consent to obey someone giving good advice are the same thing.
name: Herodotus

quote: We all agree that pessimism is a mark of superior intellect.
name: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: By the 2030s, the nonbiological portion of our intelligence will predominate.
name: Ray Kurzweil

quote: Men create real miracles when they use their God-given courage and intelligence.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: My success was not based so much on any great intelligence but on great common sense.
name: Helen Gurley Brown

quote: These little grey cells. It is up to them.
name: Agatha Christie

quote: This illusion that a lower class has less intelligence than a higher class is a complete fake-out.
name: Anohni

quote: Genius is initiative on fire.
name: Holbrook Jackson

quote: Every true genius is bound to be naive.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Some of the greatest moments in human history were fueled by emotional intelligence.
name: Adam Grant

quote: You are just your intelligence.
name: Kalpana Chawla

quote: What's more valuable - intelligence or consciousness?
name: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: Intelligence must follow faith, never precede it, and never destroy it.
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
name: Liane Cordes

quote: Technology, through automation and artificial intelligence, is definitely one of the most disruptive sources.
name: Alain Dehaze

quote: Genius always finds itself a century too early.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you would take, you must first give, this is the beginning of intelligence.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: An intellectual is a man who takes more words than necessary to tell more than he knows.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: We have now sunk to a depth at which restatement of the obvious is the first duty of intelligent men.

quote: The public is wonderfully tolerant. It forgives everything except genius.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: I don't think the intelligence reports are all that hot. Some days I get more out of the New York Times.

name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Military intelligence is a contradiction in terms.
name: Groucho Marx

name: John Keats

name: J. K. Rowling

quote: I would like to take you seriously, but to do so would be an affront to your intelligence.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Thought is a strenuous art - few practice it, and then only at rare times.
name: David Ben-Gurion

quote: They say somebody's 'street smart.' I feel like, if I got intelligence, it's just a country smart.
name: Dolly Parton

quote: Humanity I love you because when you're hard up you pawn your intelligence to buy a drink.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: Wherever smart people work, doors are unlocked.
name: Steve Wozniak

quote: Is artificial intelligence less than our intelligence?
name: Spike Jonze

quote: Be as smart as you can, but remember that it is always better to be wise than to be smart.
name: Alan Alda

quote: Intelligence is the ability to avoid doing work, yet getting the work done.

quote: Philosophy is a battle against the bewitchment of our intelligence by means of language.

quote: It is not clear that intelligence has any long-term survival value.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: You either have the charisma, the knowledge, the passion, the intelligence - or you don't.
name: Jon Gruden

quote: There is no method but to be very intelligent.
name: T. S. Eliot

name: Wayne Dyer

quote: Many intelligence reports in war are contradictory; even more are false, and most are uncertain.
name: Carl von Clausewitz

quote: Human intelligence may not be the best trick nature has to offer.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: I don't think there's anything unique about human intelligence.
name: Bill Gates

quote: Wise thinkers prevail everywhere.
name: Sophocles

quote: All intelligent thoughts have already been thought; what is necessary is only to try to think them again.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: No sooner does man discover intelligence than he tries to involve it in his own stupidity.

quote: We want to build intelligence that augments human abilities and experiences.
name: Satya Nadella

quote: One thought fills immensity.
name: William Blake

quote: Man is an intelligence in servitude to his organs.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Intelligence agencies keep things secret because they often violate the rule of law or of good behavior.
name: Julian Assange

quote: Advice to intellectuals: let no-one represent you.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: God has placed no limits to the exercise of the intellect he has given us, on this side of the grave.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: The sign of an intelligent people is their ability to control their emotions by the application of reason.

quote: It is good to rub and polish our brain against that of others.
name: Michel de Montaigne

name: Timothy Leary

quote: To think is to practice brain chemistry.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: To educate the intelligence is to expand the horizon of its wants and desires.

quote: Intelligence is a moral category.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: Intelligence is quickness in seeing things as they are.
name: George Santayana

quote: Genius might be the ability to say a profound thing in a simple way.
name: Charles Bukowski

quote: Commercial television has underestimated the intelligence of the public.

quote: An intelligent person is never afraid or ashamed to find errors in his understanding of things.

quote: In the clashes between ignorance and intelligence, ignorance is generally the aggressor.
name: Paul P. Harris

quote: I'm a big advocate of financial intelligence.
name: Daymond John

quote: The bookful blockhead, ignorantly read, With loads of learned lumber in his head.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: God gives us intelligence to uncover the wonders of nature. Without the gift, nothing is possible.
name: James Clavell

quote: Ah! yes, I know: those who see me rarely trust my word: I must look too intelligent to keep it.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Scepticism, that dry caries of the intelligence.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: A woman uses her intelligence to find reasons to support her intuition.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Don't leave home without your sword - your intellect.
name: Alan Moore

quote: Emotion is often what we rely upon to carry us across the unfathomable voids in our intelligence.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The intelligence community gets hurt through sequestration.
name: Lindsey Graham

quote: Remember to be as smart as you are.
name: Judd Nelson

quote: Play is the only way the highest intelligence of humankind can unfold.

quote: In reality, serial killers are of average intelligence.

quote: I have beauty, intelligence, individuality, sensuality and sexuality.
name: Shannon Tweed

quote: Logical activity is not the whole of intelligence. One can be intelligent without being particularly logical.

quote: It takes an extraordinary intelligence to contemplate the obvious.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: Man becomes man only by his intelligence, but he is man only by his heart.

quote: Poets are the sense, philosophers the intelligence of humanity.

name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: There is no logical reason why the camel of great art should pass through the needle of mob intelligence.

quote: The dragon is a very consistent symbol of secret satellite iconography and signals intelligence satellites.
name: Trevor Paglen

quote: Privatization is more efficient and effective in some cases, but not in intelligence.
name: Valerie Plame

quote: Man has made use of his intelligence, he invented stupidity.
name: Remy de Gourmont

quote: I've learned that intelligence alone doesn't mean a damn thing. It only leads to violence and pain.

quote: Man knows so much and does so little.
name: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Curiosity is free-wheeling intelligence.
name: Alistair Cooke

quote: How does nature amplify the intelligence of groups? It forms swarms.
name: Louis B. Rosenberg

quote: Our personal intelligence is everlasting and divine.

quote: Mad, adj. Affected with a high degree of intellectual independence.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Whatever debases the intelligence degrades the entire human being.

quote: There is no greater evidence of superior intelligence than to be surprised at nothing.

quote: Being an intellectual creates a lot of questions and no answers.

quote: I'm pretty sure there is some genetic component towards intelligence.

quote: I'm every bourgeois nightmare - a Cockney with intelligence and a million dollars.

quote: I have concluded that we are in a world made by rules created by an intelligence.

quote: There is no such thing as an underestimate of average intelligence.

quote: It is impossible to underrate human intelligence - beginning with one's own.

quote: We could have human intelligence in orbit around Mars, building things there.

quote: To be able to fill leisure intelligently is the last product of civilization.

quote: Leveraging community intelligence and making connections is a key component to being a growth hacker.

quote: If it were a fact, it wouldn't be called intelligence.
name: Donald Rumsfeld

quote: The intelligence of few perceives what has been carefully hidden in the recesses of the mind.
name: Phaedrus

quote: The highest ideals are human intelligence, creativity and love. Respect these above all.

quote: Being on the Intelligence Committee made me more of a hawk.
name: Mike Quigley

quote: A great many people think that polysyllables are a sign of intelligence.
name: Barbara Walters

quote: I think intelligence is totally subjective; it's like sexiness.

quote: It was my mother's idea. Her feeling was that I didn't have the intelligence to pick a trade myself.
name: Vidal Sassoon

quote: Education, family, character, intelligence, humility, okay? These are the things that make a culture live.
name: Jim Brown

quote: I absolutely don't think a sentient artificial intelligence is going to wage war against the human species.
name: Daniel H. Wilson

quote: A person must have a certain amount of intelligent ignorance to get anywhere.

quote: I'm a pessimist because of intelligence, but an optimist because of will.
name: Antonio Gramsci

quote: It takes a lot of things to prove you are smart, but only one thing to prove you are ignorant.
name: Don Herold

quote: When a thought takes one's breath away, a grammar lesson seems an impertinence.
name: Thomas Wentworth Higginson

quote: My biggest turn-on has to be brains, intelligence.
name: Liz Vassey

quote: I think intelligence is usually sexy until it becomes irritating. After that, you're stuck.
name: Jim Parsons

quote: Within thirty years, we will have the technological means to create superhuman intelligence.
name: Vernor Vinge

quote: Imagination is but another name for super intelligence.
name: Edgar Rice Burroughs

quote: I really admire a woman for her intelligence, her personality. Beauty is not enough.
name: Roberto Cavalli

quote: I'm fascinated by artificial intelligence.
name: Jonathan Nolan

quote: We need to make a greater investment in human intelligence.
name: Bob Graham

quote: People are smarter than you might think.
name: John Astin

name: Theodore White

quote: Never underestimate the intelligence of the audience; make good programmes, and they will come.
name: Armando Iannucci

quote: I know from personal experience that the abuse of prisoners will produce more bad than good intelligence.

quote: An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it.

quote: If little else, the brain is an educational toy.
name: Tom Robbins

quote: Clear thinking requires courage rather than intelligence.
name: Thomas Szasz

quote: No man likes to have his intelligence or good faith questioned, especially if he has doubts about it himself.
name: Henry Adams

quote: Intelligence is not a moral category.
name: Tucker Carlson

quote: Many things matter other than our measured intelligence, so let's get to work on them.

quote: Intelligence flourishes only in the ages when belief withers.
name: Emil Cioran

quote: Artificial intelligence... I've been following that since I was in high school.
name: Paul Allen

quote: A man of genius has a right to any mode of expression.
name: Ezra Pound

quote: Up to this day, there has been no proof of the existence of any intelligence other than the human.
name: Emile Zola

quote: Everyone is a genius at least once a year. The real geniuses simply have their bright ideas closer together.

quote: Belief is the death of intelligence.
name: Robert Anton Wilson

quote: There is little evidence that our individual intelligence has improved through recorded history.

quote: Superior virtue must be the fruit of superior intelligence.

quote: As a college student, what really interested me was the human brain and human intelligence.
name: Sebastian Thrun

quote: I certainly believe that improving our intelligence is of important national interest.

quote: Intelligence is the faculty of making artificial objects, especially tools to make tools.

quote: The woman who thinks she is intelligent demands equal rights with men. A woman who is intelligent does not.

name: David Fincher

quote: I don't think my intelligence is naturally analytic or political.

quote: Chess is as elaborate a waste of human intelligence as you can find outside an advertising agency.

quote: Always be smarter than the people who hire you.

quote: Iron sharpens iron; scholar, the scholar.
name: William Drummond

quote: Intelligence recognizes what has happened. Genius recognizes what will happen.

quote: Smartness runs in my family. When I went to school I was so smart my teacher was in my class for five years.
name: Gracie Allen

quote: Ignorance is no excuse, it's the real thing.
name: Irene Peter

quote: Instinct is intelligence incapable of self-consciousness.
name: John Sterling

quote: There is nobody so irritating as somebody with less intelligence and more sense than we have.
name: Don Herold

quote: Some information is important, and some is not, and intelligence consists in knowing one from the other.
name: Alexandra Petri

quote: Dissents are appeals to the brooding spirit of the law, to the intelligence of another day.

quote: Intelligence augmentation decreases the need for specialization and increases participatory complexity.
name: Jamais Cascio

quote: Hamlet is an astonishing intelligence.
name: Ben Kingsley

quote: Christianity taught men that love is worth more than intelligence.
name: Jacques Maritain

quote: Ian Fleming was my cousin, you know. He was in naval intelligence.
name: Christopher Lee

quote: All Shondaland shows have a level of intelligence, a level of humor, a level of pathos and human connection.

quote: Our actions are the results of our intentions and our intelligence.

quote: I can't tell you if genius is hereditary, because heaven has granted me no offspring.
name: James Whistler

quote: Slower television actually credits the audience with a higher level of intelligence.

quote: Human folk are as a matter of fact eager to find intelligence in animals.

quote: From the lowest animals of which we can affirm intelligence up to man this type of intellect is found.

quote: Genius is independent of situation.
name: Charles Churchill

quote: Understanding vision and building visual systems is really understanding intelligence.

quote: I feel audiences are not given enough credit for their intelligence.

quote: I want to exude strength and intelligence.
name: Portia de Rossi

quote: Your intelligence doesn't override your desire to destroy yourself.

quote: We should never overestimate an audience's culture, but we should never underestimate their intelligence.

quote: The intelligence of cinema-goers should be respected.

quote: Intellectuals are too sentimental for me.

quote: People have taught me not to look for intelligence in rockmusic.

quote: Intelligence is not a science.
name: Frank Carlucci

name: Pierre Laval

quote: The higher the voice the smaller the intellect.

quote: Truth knows no color; it appeals to intelligence.
